meanings.definition: Providing or having the power to grant exemption.
meanings.sent2: The company received an exemptive status.
meanings.sent3: The exemptive rule made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her exemptive nature shone through in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's exemptive approach to grading made learning enjoyable.

meanings.sent5: The exemptive decision brought relief to many.

meanings.sent3: His exemptive joke lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: The exemptive bond between them was unbreakable.
